transcript.title: LANCE BARNARD
transcript.content:
Fax from 6162731197 THE ACTING PRIME MINISTER
MEDIA RELEASE
LANCE BARNARD
Lance Barnard was a great citizen of Tasmania and Australia who made a signficant
contribution to Launceston, to the Labor Party, and to the nation.
I always found himn to be a kindly man, and he will have a place in history as a Minister for a
record number of portfolios at the very start of the Whitlam Labo~ r Government in December
1992. 1le went on to give service as Ambassador to Sweden, Norway and Finland from 1975 to
1978 and hc maintained an active interest in a wide range of matters in his twilight years.
On behalf of the Prime Minister and the Government, I extend sympathy to his wife Jill and
the Barnard family for their loss of a loved one, a man who it was a privilege to know.
Canberra 6 August, 1997
Parliament House, Canberra, ACT 2600 Tel ( 06) 277 7420 Fax ( 06) 273 4128
Farxftf 6 16731971182/: 058/ 99 7 Pg: 3
